title: Which is the best way to write a poem? - POEMS For Life - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm not too perfect in all these stuff but as my past experience in writting poems. As I have been writting poems since past year. I came to know various things about writting and framing poems, so that they looks more attractive and even better to read. So, here are some tips from my personal past experience of one year : Always use poetic devices (figures of speech) to make it even beautiful. Poetic devices like simili, metaphor, and the best is pun.Express your all the feelings and mug up your poem with that.Use strong words but not too much. Like use sue instead of ask.Always write slowly, nicely and try to write in your best way so that your handwriting seems good. Believe me that really matters. ;)Do not force yourself to write poem. It automatically comes inside you when you want to write.Take opinion from everyone you could. Because they are your viewers and can plug out your mistakes and tell you to improve in that particular way you need to.Always be happy. Because that will make you frame even good poems 😉Thanks for reading ❤ Follow for more 👌 Have a nice day🖒👍

A poet is a person with thoughts. To express your thoughts into words you need to jot them in poetry. Here are some ways to write poetry in the best way: Plot your thoughts into points. Frame your points into beautiful sentences using poetic device. Use of poetic device makes the poem look more attractive. Poetic devices are the figure of speech like alliteration, personification, imagery, simile, metaphor, etc. Using the same, write a poetry and this requires regular practice. Keep practicing, Keep writing!!!
It depends upon you. I can only write when it expels of out me. At other times i can never be able to write. Iris Tulip
